node.title: 'I just started to cry': Keith Urban surprises biggest little fans at Urbenville Public School with live Zoom chat
node.alt: A TV in a classroom of students with a blonde man in a black t-shirt
node.description: Some cried with joy, others were left speechless when the country music star dropped into the classroom of a small rural school, before inviting them to a concert.
node.content:
["When one of the world's biggest country music stars live zoomed\u00a0into a tiny rural school in northern New South Wales, the students of Urbenville Public School could barely believe their eyes.", "Some cried, some sat in stunned silence and others had a grin that stretched from ear to ear.", "\"Hi guys! How is everybody?\" Keith Urban said, with a big smile and a clap.", "The students (and their teacher Mel Sifko) had made no secret of their Keith Urban fandom, writing letters and holding out hope that they may get to see their favourite artist perform during his Australian tour.", "The students even took a page out of their hero's songbook, using their voices to sing reassuring songs of hope and connection, which were shared on social media \u2014 and in the car park of the local nursing home \u2014 for those in lockdown.", "It was a heartwarming gesture, even if some of the students \u2014\u00a0as their Principal Chris Sifko\u00a0put it \u2014\u00a0may not have the most \"angelic voices\" the sentiment of their messages\u00a0more than made up for it.", "Little known to them, their social media efforts were being noticed on the other side of the world.", "\"I was actually wanting to try and work out how I could get to your school, but because we're here filming (TV show) The Voice, I can't get the time to sneak away\u00a0and come and see you guys.", "\"So I said 'what else can we do?' And they said we could Zoom, so thank you so much for zooming with me this morning.\"", "", "
Keith Urban on Zoom to the students of Urbenville Public School.(ABC North Coast: Miranda Saunders)
", "
'I thought my head was going to explode'
", "During the 40 minute chat, the students discussed everything from what Keith Urban's favourite song was to when he started learning the guitar and just how long was\u00a0his hair.", "Year 5 student Kailyn Russ\u00a0said he was torn between wanting to jump out of his seat with excitement\u00a0or cry tears of joy.", "", "
Urbenville Public School students getting emotional during Keith Urban's Zoom call.(ABC North Coast: Miranda Saunders)
", "Tyler Sheardold said he had no idea Keith was about to pop up on the classroom screen.", "\"It was such a big surprise... I thought my head was going to explode when I saw Keith,\" he said.", "Amelia Russ went as far as telling Keith Urban they have renamed their school after him.", "", "
Urbenville Public School has incorporated Keith Urban in its logo for the special occasion.(ABC North Coast: Miranda Saunders)
", "
More surprises
", "Keith Urban kept the surprises coming by inviting the Urbenville Public School students to be his special guests in Brisbane during his Australian tour next year.", "\"I'd love to properly meet you all so that's the best way to do it,\" he said.\u00a0", "But the surprises didn't stop there.", "Principal Chris Sifko had a running joke with the students that if they were able to get a response from Keith Urban he would buy them all air guitars \u2014 it was a joke that he said \"still hasn't caught on with some of them\".", "Keith Urban went a few strings better, donating five guitars to the school and one for each student to take home as their own.", "", "
Urbenville Public School students with their new guitars donated by Keith Urban.(ABC North Coast: Miranda Saunders)
", "\"Sometimes you want to play on your own quietly and not in front of everybody else,\" he said.", "Principal Chris Sifko said he was just blown away at how such a small school could\u00a0not only reach out and support students around Australia, but also gain the attention of international superstars.", "\"We had word of it a little bit before hand but we decided to keep it from the kids so Keith could see the genuine joy and just how much they appreciated it.\"", "Beyond the free guitars and concert, Keith Urban said the sentiment was about sharing a passion for music.", "", "
The students at Urbenville Public School are big fans of Keith Urban.(ABC North Coast: Leah White)
", "\"Wanting to sing and play for other people, it's a really important part of everything that you guys are doing,\" he said.", "\"So thank you to the school for having such passion for music and being so supportive.\""]
